title: Lite Users (without Favorite team set)
custom_preconds:
Given a user has the previous year's MLB app installed
and is a Lite user
and is not logged in with any account
and has no favorite team(s) set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user updates to the Spring Training release
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will go through full on-boarding

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user goes through full onboarding
and gets to the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to select favorite team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects a favorite team
and taps Next
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will advance to the push notification settings page
and notifications will be toggled ON 
including MLB News
and the following of their favorite team(s):
Game Start
Game End
Score Plays
News

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user finishes with settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user will see a paywall

title: Lite Users (with Favorite team set)
custom_preconds:
Given a user has the previous year's MLB app installed
and is a lite user
and is not logged in with an account
and has favorite team(s) set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user updates to the Spring Training release
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will go through full onboarding
and see the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the Lite user goes through full onboarding
and gets to the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see their favorite team(s) selected
and will be able to edit their selection

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Lite user taps Next from the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will advance to the push notification settings page
and notifications will be toggled ON 
including MLB News and the following of their favorite team(s):
Game Start
Score Change
Game End
News

title: Paid Users (without Favorite team set)
custom_preconds:
Given a user has the previous year's At Bat app installed
and is logged in with a paid account
and does not have favorite team(s) set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user updates to the Spring Training release
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will go through full onboarding
but should NOT see the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user goes through full onboarding
and gets to the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be able to select favorite team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects a favorite team
and taps Next
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will advance to the push notification settings page
and notifications will be toggled ON 
including MLB News
and the following of their favorite team(s):
Game Start
Score Change
Game End
News

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the app settings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see their settings retained from the previous app version
and their account login should be stored

title: Paid Users (with Favorite team set)
custom_preconds:
Given a user has the previous year's MLB app installed
and is logged in with a paid account
and has favorite team(s) set

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user updates to the Spring Training release
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will go through full onboarding
but should NOT see the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user goes through full onboarding
and gets to the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see their favorite team(s) selected
and will be able to edit their selection

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Lite user taps Next from the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will advance to the push notification settings page
and notifications will be toggled ON 
including MLB News
and the following of their favorite team(s):
Game Start
Score Change
Game End
News

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the app settings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see their settings retained from the previous app version
and their account login should be stored

title: Paid Users (but not logged in)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has previous app installed
and the user has purchased or restored a paid subscription
but is not logged into the app
custom_steps: When the user updates to new release
custom_expected:
and should NOT see the paywall
and all their app settings should be retained

title: Single Team Users
custom_preconds:
Given a user has the previous At Bat app installed
and is logged in with a Single Team account
custom_steps: When the user updates to the new release
custom_expected:
Then the user will log into the app automatically without going thru onboarding
and all their settings should be retained

title: Fresh Install
custom_preconds: Given the user does not have At Bat installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user fresh installs the App
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will go through full on-boarding

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user opens the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user should see allow location access pop up message

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user select answer for the pop up
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user should see favorite team selector screen

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user see the favorite team selector
custom_steps_separated.expected: The user should select favorite team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the push notification page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then notifications will be toggled ON
including the following:
MLB News
and if they had favorited any teams, the following team notifications: 
Game Start
Score Change
Game End
News

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user sees the paywall while going through onboarding
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have the following options:
purchase an MLB.TV monthly or yearly subscription
sign in with an mlb.com account
go to the app as a Lite user
restore a purchase

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user moves on from the paywall screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought into the app

title: Fresh Install on different devices
custom_preconds:
Have AtBat app installed
Go to setting and clear user data to simulate fresh on-boarding

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the app,
custom_steps_separated.expected: See allow location access pop up window

custom_steps_separated.content: Select allow
custom_steps_separated.expected: See choose favorite team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content: Select favorite teams
custom_steps_separated.expected: See setting page

custom_steps_separated.content: Select settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: See paywall screen

custom_steps_separated.content: Select IAP or choose lite user
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought into the app

custom_steps_separated.content: Repeat the tests on Google phones and tablets
custom_steps_separated.expected: Success results per above

custom_steps_separated.content: Repeat the tests on Amazon tablets (7" and 10")
custom_steps_separated.expected: Success results per above

title: Validate onboarding with favorite team set
custom_preconds: install the app and clear app data

custom_steps_separated.content: go thru onboarding flow with favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected: See expected customize paywall with favorite team as background

title: Validate onboarding without favorite team set
custom_preconds: install the app and clear app data

custom_steps_separated.content: go thru onboarding flow with *no* favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected: see default paywall with correct subscription options to purchase
